title: #124: Jerry Sandusky and "Nice Guy Acquaintance Offenders"
description:
Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti continue their discussion about convicted serial pedophile and former Penn State football coach Jerry Sandusky

Jim describes why, despite the horrible crimes Sandusky committed, he should not be considered a "Predator" but rather a "Nice Guy Acquaintance Offender."

Sorry about some of the sound issues as there was problems with the VOIP during recording.
